attachments.title: Looking for Cherry Blossoms in Berlin? Discover 15 Top Spots
attachments.text: Find out where to see the prettiest cherry blossoms in Berlin, from Charlottenburg to Lichtenberg. Map included. Can you tick all 15 spots off your list?
attachments.fallback: Berlin & Around: Looking for Cherry Blossoms in Berlin? Discover 15 Top Spots

text: I use a mechanical one, with long key travel, but if you like a short travel, i found this one delightful when i went check on mediamarkt

text: yeah I love it, it’s a similar feeling to type as I would on my macbook and it’s small, very portable (put it in my bag when I work in the coworking office). Using this mouse with it: <https://www.amazon.com/Logitech-Ultrathin-Touch-Windows-Gestures/dp/B00DR8LA6U> and a portable laptop stand as well: <https://www.amazon.co.uk/Adjustable-Eye-Level-Ergonomic-Lightweight-Universal/dp/B06XG3193Z/ref=sr_1_37?dchild=1&keywords=portable+laptop+stand&qid=1617784768&sr=8-37|https://www.amazon.co.uk/Adjustable-Eye-Level-Ergonomic-Lightweight-Universal/dp/B06X[…]hild=1&keywords=portable+laptop+stand&qid=1617784768&sr=8-37>
